code:
var BASE_URL="https://api.coinpaprika.com/v1";// React Query의 fetcher function은 반드시 json의 Promise를 반환해야 한다.
export var fetchCoins=function fetchCoins(){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/coins")).then(function(res){return res.json();});};export var fetchCoinInfo=function fetchCoinInfo(coinId){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/coins/").concat(coinId)).then(function(res){return res.json();});};export var fetchCoinTicker=function fetchCoinTicker(coinId){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/tickers/").concat(coinId)).then(function(res){return res.json();});};export var fetchCoinHistory=function fetchCoinHistory(coinId){var endDate=Math.floor(Date.now()/1000);var startDate=endDate-60*60*24*14;return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/coins/").concat(coinId,"/ohlcv/historical?start=").concat(startDate,"&end=").concat(endDate)).then(function(res){return res.json();});};export var fetchTodayPrice=function fetchTodayPrice(coinId){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/coins/").concat(coinId,"/ohlcv/today/")).then(function(res){return res.json();});};
